Enums/NavigationBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO.name: pauseSelected

Enums/NavigationBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO.name: deleteSelected

Enums/NavigationBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO.name: restoreSelected
Enums/NavigationBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO.abstract: Restore selected deleted tasks back to download list. It is avaiable only if displayContent == .toDeleteList.

Enums/ToolBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO18SDED.name: resumeAll
Enums/ToolBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO18SDED.abstract: Resume all unfinished tasks. It won’t be displayed if displayContent == .toDeleteList.

Enums/ToolBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO18SDED.name: pauseAll

Enums/ToolBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO18SDED.name: stopAll
Enums/ToolBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO18SDED.abstract: Stop all downloading tasks and cancel all waitting tasks. It won’t be displayed if displayContent == .toDeleteList.

Enums/ToolBarActionEnum.html#/s:FO18SDED.name: deleteAll

Enums/DownloadTaskState.html#/s:FO18SDED.name: stopped
